title: Codefest Bootcamp resources are now available!
description: The CF Bootcamp, with the last session earlier today just ended! If you missed the bootcamp or want to review the material, you can find all the PPTs and resources in the resources section. Check them out now!

title: Codefest 2026 registrations have been closed.
description: Registrations for Codefest 2026 have been closed. We are excited to see all the amazing projects that will be created this year! Stay tuned for more updates and announcements.

title: Join the Codefest Discord Server Now!!!
description: Stay updated with the latest announcements, connect with fellow participants, and get support by joining our official Codefest Discord server. Click the link in the resources section to join now!

title: Codefest 2026 registrations have been EXTENDED!!!
description: On popular demand, we have extended the registration deadline to February 3rd, 2026. Hurry up and register now to secure your spot!

title: Codefest bootcamp: STARTING NOW!!!
description: The included Codefest bootcamp for all new coders that have signed up for Codefest will begin soon! All PPTs used will be in the resources section.

title: THEMES ARE OUT!!!!
description: The themes have been released! Navigate to the themes page in the navbar to begin planning your projects now! GO! GO! GO!

title: REGISTRATIONS ARE OPEN!!!
description: Registrations are out! Check the link in the navbar to register for Bangalore's biggest overnight school hackathon!
